definitions.definition: to say or tell people something more than once:
examples: Would you mind repeating what you just said?

definitions.definition: to happen, or to do something, more than once:
examples: The test must be repeated several times.

definitions.definition: to say the same thing again, or the same things again and again:
examples: His speech was dreadful - he just kept repeating himself.

definitions.definition: a situation in which something happens or is done more than once:
examples: All this is a repeat/a repeat performance of what happened last year.

definitions.definition: a television or radio programme that is broadcast again:
examples: There's nothing but repeats on television these days.
